name: Greedy Willie
description:
A roguelike adventure in a dark gold mine!!
Willie is taking some risks going into an abandoned gold mine. Guide him through the infinite galleries but be careful of the use of the TNT or he may kill himself!

Controls: WASD/Arrows.

- A-D: Left Right with 

- W: jump.

- S: place TNT (2.5 secs) .
